messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I want to return my luggage set and get the exact same one but in red color. Also, I want to return my skateboard and get a new one with a length of 34 inches and a custom design. Lastly, I want to return my hiking boots. Can you help me with these returns and exchanges?

message.content: Hi, I want to return my luggage set and get the exact same one but in red color. Also, I want to return my skateboard and get a new one with a length of 34 inches and a custom design. Lastly, I want to return my hiking boots. Can you help me with these returns and exchanges?

messages.content:
{
  "response": "I can help with returns and exchanges, but I need to verify your identity and gather details for each item. Please provide:
- Your account email (or, if you don’t know the email, your full name and zip code so I can locate your account).
- For each item you want to return/exchange, the order ID and the item ID (if you have it). You mentioned three items: luggage set, skateboard, and hiking boots.
- For the luggage set exchange: confirm you want the exact same model but in red (same variant).
- For the skateboard exchange: confirm you want a 34-inch length with a custom design (and specify the exact design or note if it’s a new design we should request from you).
- For the hiking boots return: confirm you want to return (and no exchange) or if you want an exchange as well, specify the new item details.
- For refunds: indicate whether you want refunds to the original payment method or to a gift card.

Note: Returns/exchanges can be processed only for eligible orders (pending or delivered). Once you provide the details, I’ll confirm the action list and require your explicit confirmation (Yes/No) before proceeding."
}
